title: DODGE!!!
body:
Plz figure it out my DODGE in series game!! My internet connect has just been cut off when I need to select champs.
So, I was dodged by disconnection.
and defeat for one game already on my series.. sh.it!!

replies.body: Yea, had the same thing happen to be in the past, nothing you can do but suck it up and play on. All you can do is make sure your connection is stable before playing

That's leaving a game.

Riot have no way of knowing that it was your connection dying, or you leaving intentionally. You might be able to make an appeal via support, but not very likely, as you're expected to have a stable connection before playing match-made games.
